sentences.en: A toddler requires close supervision and firm control at all times.
sentences.cn: 刚学步的孩子时刻需要寸步不离的照看，并要牢牢看紧。

sentences.en: Caution. It is dangerous to take this preparation except under medical supervision.
sentences.cn: 注意: 非经医生指示,服食此药有危险.

sentences.en: Children should not be left to play without supervision.
sentences.cn: 孩子玩的时候不能无人照看.

sentences.en: He was placed under a two-year supervision order.
In the absence of supervision, they report how much credibility?
sentences.cn: 在缺乏监管的情况下, 他们的报告又有多大可信度?

sentences.en: It brought the west coast of Sumatra practically under Dutch supervision.
sentences.cn: 它已使苏门答腊的西海岸实际上置于荷兰人管辖之下.

sentences.en: It is pointed out construction supervision is a meticulous and grave - responsibility task.
sentences.cn: 指出施工监理是一项细致而又责任重大的工作.

sentences.en: It is time to look at the supervision departments of the punching.
sentences.cn: 现在该是看监管部门出拳的时候了.

sentences.en: Shanghai will set up a - time supervision system for social security fund.
sentences.cn: 上海将建立社保基金 实时 监管系统.
宝宝时刻都要有人照看。

sentences.en: They worked under rigorous conditions and the closest supervision.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作条件苛刻而且要受最严密的监视.

sentences.en: This drug should only be taken under the supervision of a doctor.
To provide fire protection equipment alteration, design, construction, supervision and vendors management.
sentences.cn: 消防设备变更 、 设计 、 施工 、 监造及承揽商管理.

sentences.en: Two want the close supervision, the strengthened early warning.
sentences.cn: 二要密切监视, 强化预警.

sentences.en: We ask the public to have their dogs neutered and keep them under close supervision.
sentences.cn: 我们要求公众为自家的狗做绝育手术，并严格看管。

sentences.en: With your permission and under the supervision of your family . With all decorum . With all respect.
sentences.cn: 在你的允许之下,在你们全家人的监视之下,认识认识,正正派派地认识、互相尊重地认识.

words.tran_cn: 监督人，[管理] 管理人；检查员
监督（supervise的过去式和过去分词）；指导

phrases.tran_cn: 银行监管；银行业务的监督
严密监督，密切监视；闭式监视

trans.tran_cn: 监督，管理，监督的行为、过程或作用
trans.tran_en: when you supervise someone or something
